outline:
1. toil, trouble, labour
    1. trouble
    2. trouble, mischief
    3. toil, labour
kjv_def: grievance(-vousness), iniquity, labour, mischief, miserable(-sery), pain(-ful), perverseness, sorrow, toil, travail, trouble, wearisome, wickedness.
strongs_def: toil, i.e. wearing effort; hence, worry, wheth. of body or mind
